TopicTitle: BUG - Resources missing from list when loading from eva

Articles.Content:
1.1.2.1260 x64 ( steam )

Clean installation

Resources are not listed when loading a kerbal on eva and then switching to a craft in physics range, the bug is not present if craft is loaded first instead of the kerbal on eva

  1. Launch the craft
  2. Go on eva
  3. Switch back to craft with brackets
  4. check all resources listed
  5. Go to space center
  6. select kerbal on eva and click fly
  7. Switch back to craft with brackets
  8. check again all resource listed
